fr.liglab.adele.icasa.device.light
Interface BinaryLight

All Superinterfaces:
GenericDevice
All Known Implementing Classes:
UPnPBinaryLightProxyImpl, ZigbeeBinaryLight
public interface BinaryLight
extends GenericDevice

Service definition of a simple binary light device.

Author:
Gabriel Pedraza Ferreira

Field Detail

BINARY_LIGHT_POWER_STATUS

static final String BINARY_LIGHT_POWER_STATUS
Service property indicating whether the binary light is is turned on or off.
  • This property is mandatory
  • Type of values : java.lang.Boolean
  • Description : value is true when the light is turned on, false otherwise.

See Also:
getPowerStatus(), setPowerStatus(boolean), Constant Field Values

BINARY_LIGHT_MAX_POWER_LEVEL

static final String BINARY_LIGHT_MAX_POWER_LEVEL
Device property indicating the maximum power level of the binary light.
  • This property is mandatory
  • Type of values : java.lang.Double, is 100 Watts
  • Description : value is the wattage of the light. 100 watts for a normal lamp.

See Also:
getMaxPowerLevel(), Constant Field Values
